subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement I : hybridisation. Statement II : Both exhibit hybridisation. In the light of the above statements, choose the

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(2) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
